title: German Gingerbread (Lebkuchen)
ingredients: ['225g unsalted butter, softened', '440g dark brown soft sugar', '3 eggs', '225g honey', '4 tablespoons orange flavoured liqueur', '250ml soured cream', '125ml orange juice', '215g plain flour', '125g wholemeal flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '150g raisins', '110g flaked almonds']
